title: Connection problems
body:
Hello everyone, i keep getting this message like every 5 minutes, my internet is fine and i can go anywhere, the only problem i have is with LoL, it disconects every 5 minutes even tho i have internet, what is worse when i try to go into the game either in champ select or the rift it dc and i get a penalty for being afk. I already uninstalled and reinstalled the client, changed cables etc etc. 

any help i would greatly appreciate thanks.

replies.body: It sounds like you're having some network problems staying connected.  Check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen up your connection and stay in champ select.  Let me know if you have any questions!
ive gone through the entire troubleshooting list, ive opened up the ports and set the firewall, the only program that i have issues with is League of Legends, please help me with this problem.

well ive changed my DNS settings, reinstaled the client, then the problem persisted, so i did the packet loss test at http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/ and it yielded these results, unfortunately i am not network savy and i do not understand what they mean, any help i would greatly appreciate. 

thanks you.

http://n1.netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/summary/id=369839a0-14353-5076d6bf-9905-40e5-ab49#AuxInfo
